item.title: 15 Feb 2022 16:49
item.description:
Yet another terrific early AM outing to the beach. S and V joined Coach R’s group for an athletics workout session. As one of his junior coaches guided the kids on the beach sand drills, I took this opportunity to chat up with this cheerful 75+(?) … https://t.co/J5V5mTsi5E
